posts.post_content:
With kicker, this is almost a white Overrun.  
  
Anytime I play WX Agro in Zendikar limited, it wins me at least two games. I use it primarily as the aforementioned white Overrun to end games, and it can also be an emergency Glorious Charge.  
  
Outside of Limited and EDH however, this doesn't make the cut.
